content.description: Climb either of two walls, they are both the same! Climb up single pad pegs on pegs. It is just good enough to keep going, but then the pump starts to hit...enduro crimp trainer right here...move to Sturm Hall now! #RushDU
content.protection: Solo, girth hitch a peg? A pad?
content.location: It is located on the West side of the hall.

content.description: This ascends the middle flaring chimney on the south side of Sturm Hall. Get in it, and start chimneying. It is a bit harder than the average chimmey box as the back wall flares out a bit. There is a seldom done 2nd pitch up the roof and ladder to top this bad boy out.
content.protection: Solo, crash pad? Downclimb 'Pegboard' to return to the ground.
content.location: It is on the South side of Sturm Hall.

pathTokens: Denver Metropolitan Area Bouldering and Buildering
